name: Maya Patel
feedback: We launched faster because DevFlow keeps our docs, deployments, and alerts in one calm surface.

name: Luca Rivera
feedback: Beginners on our team can see shipping steps clearly, and power users script anything they need.

name: Zoe Kim
feedback: Small quality-of-life touches like the code editor preview delight us during demos.

name: Nikhil Bose
feedback: The pipeline presets meant we could demo to investors without spending a weekend wiring things up.

name: Aisha Rahman
feedback: DevFlow keeps compliance, infra, and docs in sync so audits stopped being a fire drill.

name: Gabriel Ortiz
feedback: Our beta users feel confident because every deploy note and rollback button lives in one timeline.
